Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $120 for it. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the high demand and quality of the item. I'm confident that this investment will pay off in terms of the benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
